attributes.action: Stop the mass propaganda pouring from the BBC  and others such as ITV ,Channel 4, & 5
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is regarding the mass propaganda used in the build up towards a new law being implemented in the UK, In a so called democratic country you shouldnt need blatent propaganda to control the masses or to sway their judement down a one way system of thinking, the most recent example is the show which was aired on the BBC called Horizon-The Evil Weed ? if the Heroin scare wont work on most people you bring back the ancient claim that cannabis makes you Psychotic, insane, This is just one example of many ,its horendious how the TV is used to condition people ect, you should be ashamed...

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
